column1: Someone asks if this is on the agenda
Someone says «can you hear me?» while everyone can
Microphone turns into a vacuum cleaner for 3 seconds
Someone says «sorry, I was on mute»
A vote starts and someone asks «what are we voting on?»
An amendment to the amendment is proposed
Someone says «I’m fine with whatever you decide»
A 5-minute debate about the color of something
Someone says «back in previous assemblies…»
Someone does spreadsheet math out loud
A break is requested right when it gets interesting
Someone starts with «no offense, but…»
Someone opens the wrong document
A loud «oops!» and no further explanation
Someone asks to repeat it «more slowly»
Simple majority and absolute majority get mixed up
Someone asks if they can vote via WhatsApp
A «quick point» that lasts 4 minutes
Someone brought snacks and morale instantly improves
Someone says «we discussed this in another chat»
Someone’s internet lags right when they’re about to speak
Someone suggests a «fun icebreaker»
Someone shares a meme in the chat
Someone’s pet makes a cameo
Someone forgets to unmute themselves while eating
Someone’s camera is off but you can hear background noise
Someone’s camera is on but they’re not paying attention
